Document.TEXT: SEMI Pacific Northwest Fall Breakfast Forum - Era of Internet of Things, A Technology Revolution Wednesday, October 29, 2014 7:30 AM-11:30 AM 7431 NW Evergreen Parkway, Suite 210 Hillsboro, OR 97124 A real technology revolution, the Internet of Things will impact our daily lives and literally everything we do. It is a gigantic wave of new possibilities that is destined to change the face of technology. Our panel of experts will address wearable devices, healthcare instruments, smart home, smart sensors, Big Data, and Lean Technology. Please join your industry colleagues for a stimulating discussion on the 'Era of Internet of Things, A Technology Revolution'. The SEMI Pacific Northwest Breakfast Forum provides valuable industry information and is a great opportunity to network with your colleagues and meet other local industry executives, attendees and presenters. Agenda Time Speaker Program 7:30am Breakfast & Registration
